faq.question: Is it safe to use Discord boosting services?
faq.answer: Yes, our services are 100% safe and comply with Discord's terms of service. We use legitimate methods to boost your server.

faq.question: What is your refund policy?
faq.answer: All sales are final. We do not offer refunds on any of our services. Please ensure you understand what you're purchasing before completing your order.

faq.question: Are these subscription services?
faq.answer: No! All our server boost packages are one-time purchases. You pay once and receive the specified duration without any recurring charges.

faq.question: How quickly will I see results?
faq.answer: Server boosts and Nitro gift codes are delivered instantly upon purchase. There are no delays or waiting periods.

faq.question: How do Discord Nitro gifts work?
faq.answer: After purchase, you'll receive a Discord Nitro gift code that can be redeemed on Discord for all Nitro benefits.
